vote.title: In Recognition of the Renaming of the Adventure Center to the Ben Espy Center
vote.description:
Title
 
In Recognition of the Renaming of the Adventure Center to the Ben Espy Center 
 
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Benjamin “Ben” Espy was a trailblazer in Columbus politics, serving with distinction as both a member of Columbus City Council and in the Ohio State Senate, where he became the first African American to serve in Senate leadership; and
 
WHEREAS, throughout his public service, Senator Espy was a fierce advocate for equity, transparency, and working families. Consistently standing up to special interests and fighting for policies that uplifted underserved communities; and
 
WHEREAS, Senator Espy’s legacy includes shaping key legislation, advancing civil rights, and mentoring the next generation of civic leaders-leaving a lasting imprint on the political and cultural fabric of Columbus; and
 
WHEREAS, his leadership style was defined by bold action, integrity, and an unshakeable commitment to doing what was right, even when it was not politically expedient; and
 
WHEREAS, the Adventure Center, part of the Columbus Recreation and Parks Department, is a space dedicated to exploration, learning, and growth-values that reflect Senator Espy's lifelong commitment to empowering youth and strengthening community; and
 
WHEREAS, The city of Columbus is more than grateful to acknowledge the importance of Ben Espy Adventure Center to honor his extraordinary contributions to the city and ensure his legacy continues to inspire future generations;
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council proudly recognizes the renaming of the Adventure Center to the Ben Espy Adventure Center, in honor of a dedicated public servant whose leadership, vision, and advocacy continue to shape the city of Columbus for the better.
